alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Inland Nassau; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, Bradford, northeastern Alachua, southeastern Baker, northwestern Putnam, northeastern Union, western Clay and southwestern Duval Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sanderson to near Starke to Gainesville Airport. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Starke, Keystone Heights, Raiford, Melrose, Middleburg, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Maxville, New River and Lake Geneva. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Inland Nassau; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval; Western Putnam
